Trump Winery beverages have been sold at: 2. The wines have been sold by a private company contracted by the National Park Service, not by the federal government, and came from stock purchased before Trump became president.
The energy and environment: oriented publication E&E News reported the sale of Trump-branded wines at a gift shop in Virginia's Shenandoah National Park.
The private company operating the gift s: Delaware North, has been selling wines produced by Trump Winery (previously Kluge Estate) since before the Trump Winery acquired it.
